hero.mission: I am determined to join a work-study program to obtain my RNCP Level 5 title in web development. I am ready to fully invest myself to acquire the necessary skills and become a competent and operational web developer. This opportunity represents a springboard for me towards a rewarding and dynamic career in web development.

about.title: About Me
about.para1: I am 24 years old and hold a degree in economics. Passionate about the digital world, I shifted my focus to web and application development. My adaptability and quick learning make me an asset for any ambitious project.
about.para2: I have specialized in the MERN stack, with a particular focus on React.js and Node.js. I have also completed projects in PHP, Java, Flutter, and Python.

services.title: My services
services.webDevDesc: Completely design a website, put it online and keep it up to date.
services.appDevDesc: Fully design, deploy, and maintain an application.
services.updateDesc: Update your site or app, maintain it, or renovate it.

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.desc: If you wish to get in touch, ask questions, work on a project, or arrange an interview, don't hesitate to contact me   !
